trans-unit.source: Provides detailed information about a <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce informazioni dettagliate su un oggetto <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instances are obtained from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> le istanze vengono ottenute dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> su <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The information in <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> is obtained by parsing the attributes decorating speech text in the Synthesize Speech Markup Language (SSML) used as an input to a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni contenute in <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> consente di ottenere gli attributi, la decorazione di testo parlato nel sintetizzare vocale Markup Language (SSML) utilizzato come input per un motore di sintesi di analisi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object can exist for any synthesizer action request as specified by its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> oggetto è disponibile per qualsiasi richiesta di azione sintetizzatore come specificato dal relativo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: However, the meaning of its members may change for different actions.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il significato dei relativi membri possono essere modificati per azioni diverse.

trans-unit.source: For more information on synthesize actions, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> for more information about specifying synthesizer actions.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su sintetizzare azioni, vedere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> per ulteriori informazioni sulla specifica delle azioni sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: Specification and control of the quality of the spoken output is largely handled through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>
trans-unit.target: Specifica e controllo della qualità dell'output parlata in gran parte vengono gestite tramite il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Phonetic, language, and linguist structure information is available through <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sulla struttura fonetico, lingua e fase è disponibile tramite <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> enumeration that specifies a speech synthesis action.
trans-unit.target: Membro dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> che specifica un'azione di sintesi vocale.

trans-unit.source: The id of the language being used.
trans-unit.target: ID della lingua in uso.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the XML <c>xml:lang</c> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde all'attributo XML <c>xml:lang</c>.

trans-unit.source: The emphasis to be applied to speech output or pauses.
trans-unit.target: Enfasi da applicare all'output o alle pause vocali.

trans-unit.source: The time allotted to speak the text of the <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Tempo assegnato per pronunciare il testo di <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> class, indicating the type of text of the <see langword="TextFragment" /> and the level of detail required for accurate rendering of the contained text.
trans-unit.target: Membro della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> che indica il tipo di testo di <see langword="TextFragment" /> e il livello di dettaglio richiesto per il corretto rendering del testo contenuto.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><say-as></c> XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al tag XML <c><say-as></c> nella specifica SSML

trans-unit.source: The argument may be <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: L'argomento può essere <see langword="null." />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> object indicating characteristics of the speech output such as pitch, speaking rate and volume.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> che indica le caratteristiche dell'output vocale come il passo, la velocità di pronuncia e il volume.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><prosody></c> XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al tag XML <c><prosody></c> nella specifica SSML

trans-unit.source: An array of <see langword="char" /> objects providing the phonetic pronunciation for text contained in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) specification.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see langword="char" /> che forniscono la pronuncia fonetica per il testo contenuto in <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, mediante la specifica dell'alfabeto fonetico internazionale (IPA).

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><phoneme></c> XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al tag XML <c><phoneme></c> nella specifica SSML.

trans-unit.source: This argument may be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo argomento può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see langword="FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Costruisce una nuova istanza di <see langword="FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications do not directly construct <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objects.
trans-unit.target: In genere, le applicazioni non costruire direttamente <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instances are created by applications using the members of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> istanze vengono create utilizzando i membri di applicazioni di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> spazio dei nomi.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value specified by the `action` argument is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>, the value supplied by the `emphasis` argument is either:
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> specificato dal valore di `action` argomento è <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>, il valore fornito dal `emphasis` argomento è:

trans-unit.source: If positive, the time in millisecond to pause
trans-unit.target: Se è positivo, il tempo in millisecondi per mettere in pausa

trans-unit.source: If negative a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> enumeration
trans-unit.target: Se un negativo di un membro del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> enumerazione

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value specified by the `action` argument is not <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>`emphasis` argument must be of type <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> specificato dal valore di `action` argomento non è <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> `emphasis` argomento deve essere di tipo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `duration` argument and The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> object specified by the `prosody` argument differ, the value on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> object is used.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore del `duration` argomento e il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A> proprietà o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> oggetto specificato dal `prosody` argomento variano, il valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> oggetto viene utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the requested speech synthesizer action.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'azione richiesta di sintetizzatore vocale.

trans-unit.source: A member of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> indicating the speech synthesis action requested by SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Membro di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> che indica l'azione di sintesi vocale richiesta dall'input SSML.

trans-unit.source: Returns the desired time for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il tempo desiderato per il rendering di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> containing a value in millisecond of the desired time for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see langword="int" /> contenente un valore in millisecondi del tempo desiderato per il rendering di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns instructions on how to emphasize a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce istruzioni su come evidenziare un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> value indicating how to emphasize a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore <see langword="int" /> che indica come evidenziare un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The interpretation of the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> depends on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>.
trans-unit.target: L'interpretazione del valore restituito da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> dipende il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà corrente <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>
trans-unit.target: Se il valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> è <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> is positive, the value returned should be interpreted as the length of the silence in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> è positivo, il valore restituito deve essere interpretato come l'intervallo di inattività in millisecondi.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> is negative, the value returned should be interpreted as a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> è negativo, il valore restituito devono essere interpretate come membro di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>.

trans-unit.source: Emphasis information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> when the property <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> corresponds to the attributes of the `<break>` element of SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni di enfasi restituite da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> quando la proprietà <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> è <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> corrisponde agli attributi del `<break>` elemento di input SSML a un modulo di sintetizzatore vocale.

trans-unit.source: For all other values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> values should be interpreted as being of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.
trans-unit.target: Per tutti gli altri valori di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> i valori devono essere interpretati come può essere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.

trans-unit.source: Emphasis information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> for spoken words corresponds to the attributes of the `<emphasis>` element of SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni di enfasi restituite da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> per i dialoghi corrisponde agli attributi del `<emphasis>` elemento di input SSML a un modulo di sintetizzatore vocale.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state as another <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> instance, or an [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) which can be cast to <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> descrive lo stesso stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> di un'altra istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> o in una classe [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) di cui è possibile eseguire il cast a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be cast to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Oggetto di cui è possibile eseguire il cast a un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given object is an instance <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto specificato è un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> uguale all'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" />, if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and that obtained from the [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) provided by the <paramref name="obj" /> argument describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="true" /> se l'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> e quella ottenuta dalla classe [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) specificata dall'argomento <paramref name="obj" /> descrivono lo stesso stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and the <paramref name="obj" /> argument do not support the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="false" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> corrente e l'argomento <paramref name="obj" /> non supportano lo stesso stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The method return false if the [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) provided by the `obj` argument cannot be cast to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo restituisce false se il [oggetto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) fornito dal `obj` argomento non è possibile eseguire il cast <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> that
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> che

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> is equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un data istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> è uguale all'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" />, if both the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and that supplied through the <paramref name="other" /> argument describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="true" /> se l'istanza corrente di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> e quella fornita tramite l'argomento <paramref name="other" /> descrivono lo stesso stato <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and the <paramref name="other" /> argument do not support the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="false" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> corrente e l'argomento <paramref name="other" /> non supportano lo stesso stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Intero con segno a 32 bit che rappresenta il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Returns the language supported by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il linguaggio supportato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> containing an identifier for the language used by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see langword="int" /> contenente un identificatore per il linguaggio usato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A> are those used with the Windows Speech API (SAPI) and are generated from the "`xml:lang`" attribute on SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A> quelli utilizzati con Windows Speech API (SAPI) e vengono generati dal "`xml:lang`" attributo Input SSML a un modulo di sintetizzatore vocale.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state2</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> il cui stato descritto viene confrontato con l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> specificata dall'argomento <c>state2</c>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state1</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> il cui stato descritto viene confrontato con l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> specificata dall'argomento <c>state1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> descrivono lo stesso stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> and <paramref name="state2" />, describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state, otherwise <see langword="false" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="true" /> se entrambe le istanze di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, di <paramref name="state1" /> e di <paramref name="state2" />, descrivono lo stesso stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />; in caso contrario, viene restituito <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state2</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> il cui stato descritto viene confrontato con l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> specificata dall'argomento <c>state2</c>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state1</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> il cui stato descritto viene confrontato con l'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> specificata dall'argomento <c>state1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the different <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> descrivono il diverso stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> and <paramref name="state2" />, do not describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state, otherwise <see langword="false" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <see langword="true" /> se entrambe le istanze di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, di <paramref name="state1" /> e di <paramref name="state2" /> non descrivono lo stesso stato di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />; in caso contrario, viene restituito <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Returns phonetic information for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Restituisce le informazioni fonetiche per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> property corresponds to the `<phoneme>` XML tag of SSML input to a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni restituite dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> proprietà corrisponde al `<phoneme>` tag XML di input SSML a un motore di sintesi.

trans-unit.source: The array of `char` objects returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> property expresses pronunciation using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).
trans-unit.target: Matrice di `char` gli oggetti restituiti da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> proprietà esprime pronuncia utilizzando alfabeto fonetico internazionale (IPA).

trans-unit.source: Returns detailed information about the pitch, speaking rate, and volume of speech output.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce informazioni dettagliate su tono, velocità di pronuncia e volume dell'output vocale.

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> containing the pitch, speaking rate, and volume settings, and changes to those setting, for speech output.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un'istanza valida di <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> che contenente le impostazioni di tono, velocità di pronuncia e volume e modifica tali impostazioni per l'output vocale.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> corresponds to the `<prosody>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni restituite da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> corrisponde al `<prosody>` (tag XML) nella specifica SSML

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the context for the generation of speech from text..
trans-unit.target: Restituisce informazioni sul contesto per la generazione di sintesi vocale.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> instance if the SSML used by a speech synthesis engine contains detailed information about the context to be used to generate speech, otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> di valore se l'elemento SSML usato dal motore di sintesi vocale contiene informazioni dettagliate sul contesto da usare per generare il riconoscimento vocale; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> corresponds to the `<say-as>` tag and its attributes in the SSML specification, and can specify:
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni restituite da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> corrisponde alla `<say-as>` tag e i relativi attributi nella specifica SSML e può specificano:

trans-unit.source: The content type (such as currency, date, or address) or language construct represented by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di contenuto (ad esempio valuta, data o l'indirizzo) o di un costrutto di linguaggio rappresentato da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> proprietà di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Optional formatting information to handle the content type represented by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, for example, a date syntax.
trans-unit.target: Facoltativo, le informazioni di formattazione per gestire il tipo di contenuto rappresentato da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> proprietà di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, ad esempio, una sintassi di Data.

trans-unit.source: The detail to be used in generating speech from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, for example, whether to explicitly render punctuation.
trans-unit.target: I dettagli da utilizzare per la generazione di riconoscimento vocale dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> proprietà di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, ad esempio, se eseguire il rendering in modo esplicito di punteggiatura.
